name: A. Turrent - Tradicional - Belicoso
additionalNotes:
A. Turrent Cigars are medium bodied cigars originated in Mexico and available worldwide. Filled with finest quality Mexican tobacco, these cigars were produced by Alberto and Alejandro Turrent, owners of Nueva Matacapan de Tabacos S.A. de C.V., this the first family of Mexico's cigar industry and the 
The A. Turrent Cigars are made with utmost care and strict supervision to ensure that each of the pieces provide rich smoking experience. A. Turrent Cigars are available in various shapes like Belicoso, Churchill, Gordo, Robusto, Toro, these cigars are full of rich flavors and aroma that are enjoyed by all.
